summary: My Home (Part 11)
title: My Home (Part 11)
body:
Peter Parker x Reader

Part 11… Peter Parker

Word count: 1.28 k words 

A/n: Tell me if you want to get added to the TAGLIST of My Home! For more parts see ‘MASTERLIST’ in my profile description!

Peter’s POV:

“Hey where are you going?” I asked Y/n as she starts walking in the other direction than her home after we came out of Doctor Strange’s portal.
“Ssshh,” she hushed as I followed her. And she walked to the little empty lane behind the park where some homeless people were living in small tents. 

“What’s here?” I whispered raising my eyebrows behind my mask. She softly smiled taking out a box from her little backpack she was carrying all this time.
“Wait, is it the candy box you won in the fantasy quiz in school? But what you doing with it here?” I blasted her with questions, once again.
“Come with me!” She walked behind the tents where some people were warming their hands in born fire. Sensing our presence the four little children in the group cheerfully ran to us and smiled at Y/n. That’s when I understood Y/n was handling the candies to the children.
“You do this often?” I asked walking her back home.
“What?" 
"Giving those homeless children stuff?”
“Ah… No actually. I don’t have anything to give often. Like if sometimes I get these things and I can't  eat them all by myself then I give it to them. I recently saw those children there , maybe just 2 months ago. They are really friendly… Especially when you don’t have many friends .” She concluded as we reached her foster home.
“Thanks Spidey…” She said giving me a wave and went inside the house as I swung back to mine.
I laid on my bed sleepless thinking about her. 


•••
Time is the most fickle minded thing in the universe,
It changes every now and then,
making you feel vulnerable each and every time…
And it totally applies to my life.


The girl I never thought about ever, till now, is the reason why I couldn’t sleep all night. She wasn’t even part of my life before sometime and now I can’t imagine my life without her. I want to know her more, spend time with her, but…
What if the person who’s coming for the ring, actually reaches us?
What if we lose?
Maybe we die in the process,
but death doesn’t feel sad when you think about the opposite scenario.
What if we won?
What if she goes back to her home, leaving me behind?
Can I live without her after what she has done to me, what she made me feel?
Her thoughts, her pure thoughts made me fall for her and now I can’t escape these feelings, especially after trying to imagine my life without her… And I saw only darkness.
“Peter, Peter, Peter”, faint voices could be heard, I felt my body shaking. Suddenly I could see a bright light filling the darkness, making my eyes squint as I slowly lifted my eyelids to see a faint figure standing in front of me. I blinked multiple times until I could see clearly.
“Y/n?” I almost whispered, seeing her standing in front of me.
I looked around, realizing that I was sitting on my desk with my head down. Not sleeping last night made me pass out here on the classroom desk.
“Oh god, you weren’t waking up, are you okay?” She asked worriedly.
“Yeah I am fine, I think I just slept” I answered as she came and took a seat with me.
“You sure you’re alright?” She asked as she touched my forehead.
“Yeah, I am, don’t worry,” I replied, smiling seeing how concerned she was.
“Now, let’s go, it’s lunch, Ned will be joining us there,” she said, getting up. 
I nodded and took a seat in the school canteen, meeting my friend Ned there.
I introduced Y/n and Ned to each other and I guess we all are part of a small friend circle.
“I am so happy I’m sitting with you both, Liz and her friends made me sick!” She said with disgust in her voice.
Then she looked at me.
“Shit sorry, I mean I forgot you like her…I am seriously sorry….” she anxiously chattered.
I held her anxiously waving hands in mine, making her stop.
“It’s fine, I am not into her anymore,” I said, looking deep into her eyes, almost getting lost in them.
*cough* *cough*
I heard coughing sounds in the background. My dear friend Ned Leeds was fake coughing to break this awkward moment. Listening to that, Y/n shook her hands and pulled away, she looked down a little embarrassed. I didn’t want to make her uncomfortable. So, I tried to instantly change the topic.
“So..  ah… guys as you know the winter vacation is starting from tomorrow, so there is a small Christmas dinner at my house on the Christmas eve. This year we don’t have any relatives visiting so I would be glad if both of you could join me and aunt May..”, I invited them with a smile.
“I would love to come”, Ned said a little excited, but Y/n was still looking down.
“Are you coming Y/n?” Ned asked her, getting her to gaze up again.
“Huh! Where?” She said, tugging a loose hair strand behind her ear.
“Peter just invited us for Christmas dinner, so will you join?” Ned explained to Y/n.
“Oh, yeah yeah I will,” she said, sounding a little nervous.
And then we all followed our school routine and finally left for our home. I actually didn’t start training Y/n as promised, cause maybe… Maybe I was too nervous to see her, until it was finally the Christmas dinner.


•••
Ned and Y/n both arrived almost at the same time, just a couple of minutes here and there. Y/n was wearing a solid, back long sleeve scoop top and a red black plaid skirt with black leggings and a matching muffler around her neck.
Simple, but graceful.
May served us the Christmas feast and talked to all of us. The dinner was delicious. Also, both, Y/n and Ned, were cheerfully taking part in the conversations. After a while, Ned left to join his own family.
I want to tell Y/n how I feel, but this Peter Parker avatar makes me feel nervous. Hiding behind a mask is quite easy for these kinds of situations.
“Y/n a-actually, Spider-man wanted to meet you so, he’s waiting for you on the roof, you should meet him”, I said.
She looked at me with narrow eyes.
“Is that so?” She asked, raising eyebrows.
“Yeah yeah!” I said, shaking my head.
“Okay, then I’ll meet him!” She said and walked towards the stairs. I ran into my room, putting on my Spider-man costume and left through my window reaching the roof.
Y/n was already standing there. She turned, hearing my footsteps.
“I-I just wanted to tell you something,” I said, getting close to her. 
“Why don’t you tell me whatever you wanted to tell, but without that mask”, she said with a small grin.
“What? I ah… it’s…”, I tried to process what she just said.
“Believe me, it won’t make any difference to me!” She said, moving her hands towards my mask. She lightly grabbed the edge of my mask.
“Can I?” She spoke, indicating that she wanted to lift that mask.
Her gaze was fixed on me. I couldn’t reply anything so I nodded in a ‘yes’.

(TBC) (I THINK I HAVE A THING OR TWO FOR WALLFLOWERS… DUH! I AM NOT THINKING I AM FUCKIN’ SURE!!! GUYS LIKE PETER ATE HE DEATH OF ME’ ESPECIALLY WHEN THEY ARE FICTIONAL…) (NEXT PART IS GOING TO BE VERY ——- NO SPOILERS ;) 

Taglist in the reblogged post. Tell me if you wanna get added :)

“I-I just wanted to tell you something,” I said, getting close to her. 
“Why don’t you tell me whatever you wanted to tell, but without that mask”, she said with a small grin.
“What? I ah… it’s…”, I tried to process what she just said.
“Believe me, it won’t make any difference to me!” She said, moving her hands towards my mask. She lightly grabbed the edge of my mask.
“Can I?” She spoke, indicating that she wanted to lift that mask.
Her gaze was fixed on me. I couldn’t reply anything so I nodded in a ‘yes’.

Peter Parker x Reader

Part 11… Peter Parker

Word count: 1.28 k words 

A/n: Tell me if you want to get added to the TAGLIST of My Home! For more parts see ‘MASTERLIST’ in my profile description!

Peter’s POV:

“Hey where are you going?” I asked Y/n as she starts walking in the other direction than her home after we came out of Doctor Strange’s portal.
“Ssshh,” she hushed as I followed her. And she walked to the little empty lane behind the park where some homeless people were living in small tents. 

“What’s here?” I whispered raising my eyebrows behind my mask. She softly smiled taking out a box from her little backpack she was carrying all this time.
“Wait, is it the candy box you won in the fantasy quiz in school? But what you doing with it here?” I blasted her with questions, once again.
“Come with me!” She walked behind the tents where some people were warming their hands in born fire. Sensing our presence the four little children in the group cheerfully ran to us and smiled at Y/n. That’s when I understood Y/n was handling the candies to the children.
“You do this often?” I asked walking her back home.
“What?" 
"Giving those homeless children stuff?”
“Ah… No actually. I don’t have anything to give often. Like if sometimes I get these things and I can't  eat them all by myself then I give it to them. I recently saw those children there , maybe just 2 months ago. They are really friendly… Especially when you don’t have many friends .” She concluded as we reached her foster home.
“Thanks Spidey…” She said giving me a wave and went inside the house as I swung back to mine.
I laid on my bed sleepless thinking about her. 

[[MORE]]


•••
Time is the most fickle minded thing in the universe,
It changes every now and then,
making you feel vulnerable each and every time…
And it totally applies to my life.


The girl I never thought about ever, till now, is the reason why I couldn’t sleep all night. She wasn’t even part of my life before sometime and now I can’t imagine my life without her. I want to know her more, spend time with her, but…
What if the person who’s coming for the ring, actually reaches us?
What if we lose?
Maybe we die in the process,
but death doesn’t feel sad when you think about the opposite scenario.
What if we won?
What if she goes back to her home, leaving me behind?
Can I live without her after what she has done to me, what she made me feel?
Her thoughts, her pure thoughts made me fall for her and now I can’t escape these feelings, especially after trying to imagine my life without her… And I saw only darkness.
“Peter, Peter, Peter”, faint voices could be heard, I felt my body shaking. Suddenly I could see a bright light filling the darkness, making my eyes squint as I slowly lifted my eyelids to see a faint figure standing in front of me. I blinked multiple times until I could see clearly.
“Y/n?” I almost whispered, seeing her standing in front of me.
I looked around, realizing that I was sitting on my desk with my head down. Not sleeping last night made me pass out here on the classroom desk.
“Oh god, you weren’t waking up, are you okay?” She asked worriedly.
“Yeah I am fine, I think I just slept” I answered as she came and took a seat with me.
“You sure you’re alright?” She asked as she touched my forehead.
“Yeah, I am, don’t worry,” I replied, smiling seeing how concerned she was.
“Now, let’s go, it’s lunch, Ned will be joining us there,” she said, getting up. 
I nodded and took a seat in the school canteen, meeting my friend Ned there.
I introduced Y/n and Ned to each other and I guess we all are part of a small friend circle.
“I am so happy I’m sitting with you both, Liz and her friends made me sick!” She said with disgust in her voice.
Then she looked at me.
“Shit sorry, I mean I forgot you like her…I am seriously sorry….” she anxiously chattered.
I held her anxiously waving hands in mine, making her stop.
“It’s fine, I am not into her anymore,” I said, looking deep into her eyes, almost getting lost in them.
*cough* *cough*
I heard coughing sounds in the background. My dear friend Ned Leeds was fake coughing to break this awkward moment. Listening to that, Y/n shook her hands and pulled away, she looked down a little embarrassed. I didn’t want to make her uncomfortable. So, I tried to instantly change the topic.
“So..  ah… guys as you know the winter vacation is starting from tomorrow, so there is a small Christmas dinner at my house on the Christmas eve. This year we don’t have any relatives visiting so I would be glad if both of you could join me and aunt May..”, I invited them with a smile.
“I would love to come”, Ned said a little excited, but Y/n was still looking down.
“Are you coming Y/n?” Ned asked her, getting her to gaze up again.
“Huh! Where?” She said, tugging a loose hair strand behind her ear.
“Peter just invited us for Christmas dinner, so will you join?” Ned explained to Y/n.
“Oh, yeah yeah I will,” she said, sounding a little nervous.
And then we all followed our school routine and finally left for our home. I actually didn’t start training Y/n as promised, cause maybe… Maybe I was too nervous to see her, until it was finally the Christmas dinner.


•••
Ned and Y/n both arrived almost at the same time, just a couple of minutes here and there. Y/n was wearing a solid, back long sleeve scoop top and a red black plaid skirt with black leggings and a matching muffler around her neck.
Simple, but graceful.
May served us the Christmas feast and talked to all of us. The dinner was delicious. Also, both, Y/n and Ned, were cheerfully taking part in the conversations. After a while, Ned left to join his own family.
I want to tell Y/n how I feel, but this Peter Parker avatar makes me feel nervous. Hiding behind a mask is quite easy for these kinds of situations.
“Y/n a-actually, Spider-man wanted to meet you so, he’s waiting for you on the roof, you should meet him”, I said.
She looked at me with narrow eyes.
“Is that so?” She asked, raising eyebrows.
“Yeah yeah!” I said, shaking my head.
“Okay, then I’ll meet him!” She said and walked towards the stairs. I ran into my room, putting on my Spider-man costume and left through my window reaching the roof.
Y/n was already standing there. She turned, hearing my footsteps.
“I-I just wanted to tell you something,” I said, getting close to her. 
“Why don’t you tell me whatever you wanted to tell, but without that mask”, she said with a small grin.
“What? I ah… it’s…”, I tried to process what she just said.
“Believe me, it won’t make any difference to me!” She said, moving her hands towards my mask. She lightly grabbed the edge of my mask.
“Can I?” She spoke, indicating that she wanted to lift that mask.
Her gaze was fixed on me. I couldn’t reply anything so I nodded in a ‘yes’.

body:
Thor, introducing Rocket to Peter: “ Sweet rabbit, this is Peter, Tony’s son”.

Peter Parker, who is overwhelmed by finally meeting Thor(!) who is definitely attractive no matter what Star-Lord says, and can’t believe there’s a talking raccoon who has multiple weapons but doesn’t correct Thor when he calls him a rabbit because he’s actually a sweetie who has been through so much: 😍😍😍😍😍

summary: The Cold's Deceit
title: The Cold's Deceit
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Jhl1X3

by MercyMae

“I’m not worried about me,” Tony snapped, looking at the rear mirror. He saw Peter slumbering with his small mouth covering his mouth.

“I know you’re worried about Pete,” Pepper said slowly, and Tony gripped the wheel tightly. Of course he was worried about Peter. His kid was the most important thing in his life. He looked at the road in front of him. Snowflakes landed on his windshield with a small thump. So soft, yet so deadly.

Or…

They get stuck in a snowstorm.
